about_the_game:
This DLC is a gallery mode for game events only.
You can see sexy illustrations and animations without having to complete the game.

Method of operation:
Select a girl in the title menu.
You can see 3 patterns of events.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

This game contains explicit consensual sex scenes. The topics cover mainstream pornographic themes, such as but not limited to male/female explicit sex scenes, female/female, vaginal/oral/anal sex, toys, seduction, and consensual BDSM.

detailed_description:
This DLC is a gallery mode for game events only.
You can see sexy illustrations and animations without having to complete the game.

Method of operation:
Select a girl in the title menu.
You can see 3 patterns of events.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: MINE - Gallery 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A gallery of sexy girl illustrations, nudes and animations.
